TypeSignature.Value: public delegate TOutput Converter<in TInput,out TOutput>(TInput input);
.class public auto ansi sealed Converter`2<- TInput, + TOutput> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function Converter(Of In TInput, Out TOutput)(input As TInput) As TOutput
generic <typename TInput, typename TOutput> public delegate TOutput Converter(TInput input);
.class public auto ansi sealed Converter`2<TInput, TOutput> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function Converter(Of TInput, TOutput)(input As TInput) As TOutput

span.span: The type of object that is to be converted.

typeparam.name: TOutput
typeparam.span: 要将输入对象转换到的类型。

span.span: The type the input object is to be converted to.

summary.span: 表示将对象从一种类型转换为另一种类型的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that converts an object from one type to another type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该类的 方法和类的方法使用此委托 将集合的每个元素从一种类型转换为另一种类型。This delegate is used by the method of the class and the method of the class to convert each element of the collection from one type to another. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示了 委托，其中包含 类的方法 ，第二个示例演示了具有 泛型类的方法的委托 。The first demonstrates the delegate with the method of the class, and the second demonstrates the delegate with the method of the generic class. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例定义了一个名为 `PointFToPoint` 的方法，该方法将 结构转换为 结构。The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a structure to a structure. 然后，该示例创建一个 结构数组， `Converter` `Converter(Of PointF, Point)` 在 Visual Basic) 中创建委托 (来表示 `PointFToPoint` 方法，并将委托传递给 方法。The example then creates an array of structures, creates a `Converter` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the method. 方法将输入列表的每个元素传递给 `PointFToPoint` 方法，并将转换后的元素放入新的 结构列表。The method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of structures. 将显示这两个列表。Both lists are displayed. [!code-cpp[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/vb/source.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例定义了一个名为 `PointFToPoint` 的方法，该方法将 结构转换为 结构。The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a structure to a structure. 然后，该示例创建了一个 结构， `Converter\` `Converter(Of PointF, Point)` 在 Visual Basic) 中创建委托 (来表示 `PointFToPoint` 方法，并将委托传递给 方法。The example then creates a of structures, creates a `Converter\` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the method. 方法将输入列表的每个元素传递给 `PointFToPoint` 方法，并将转换后的元素放入新的 结构列表。The method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of structures. 将显示这两个列表。Both lists are displayed. [!code-cpp[List\`1_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_ConvertAll/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[List\`1_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_ConvertAll/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_ConvertAll/vb/source.vb#1)]
